attributes.action: to stop the closure of Craigentinny Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Edinburgh Council has listed Craigentinny Primary School as 1 of 22 schools & nursuries in the Edinburgh Area for closure. There is no room in the 2 schools that the council propose to send the children to if the school is closed.  Craigentinny also has 2 language classes for. children with learning difficulties and a wrap-a-round programme for working parents which includes breakfast club & after school club.  Please back our campaign
